text: Carol Fran (October 23, 1933 â€“ September 1, 2021) was an American soul blues singer, pianist, and songwriter. She was best known for her single releases in the 1950s and 1960s. Fran died on September 1, 2021 in Lafayette, Louisiana from problems caused by COVID-19, aged 87. ==Albums== Year Title Record label 1992 Soul Sensation Black Top 1994 See There!
